tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flooding_areas (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(255),
  elevation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE areas (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
elevation DOUBLE NOT NULL,
flood_prone BOOLEAN NOT NULL)},{

CREATE TABLE rivers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
length DOUBLE NOT NULL,
source_area VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)},{

CREATE TABLE locations (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
latitude DOUBLE NOT NULL,
longitude DOUBLE NOT NULL)},{

CREATE TABLE measurements (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
location_id INT NOT NULL,
area_id INT NOT NULL,
value DOUBLE NOT NULL,
measurement_date DATE NOT NULL)},{

CREATE TABLE observations (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
location_id INT NOT NULL,
elevation_change DOUBLE NOT NULL,
observation_date DATE NOT NULL)
